data.comment: Today's referee, Antonio Alberola Rojas, has blown to start the match.
Alaves drive upfield and Joselu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Antonio Alberola Rojas awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Celta Vigo are coming forward and Nolito gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
Rodrigo Ely (Alaves) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Celta Vigo defenders.
In the minute 6, Alaves have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a Alaves throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 9, Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Alaves defence as Nolito fires in a strike for Celta Vigo.
In the minute 12, In Vigo Celta Vigo attack through Lucas Olaza. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Alaves at Municipal de Balaidos.
Antonio Alberola Rojas awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Alaves in the half of Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Antonio Alberola Rojas.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 19, Goal! Celta Vigo have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Brais Mendez.
Great play from Lucas Olaza to set up the goal.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
In the minute 20, At Municipal de Balaidos, Rodrigo Battaglia has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alaves have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo push upfield but Antonio Alberola Rojas quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 29, Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Celta Vigo's Brais Mendez is whistled for offside at Municipal de Balaidos.
Celta Vigo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Celta Vigo.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Antonio Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
Tomas Pina for Alaves has been booked by Antonio Alberola Rojas and receives a first yellow card.
Lucas Olaza has recovered and rejoins the match in Vigo.
Lucas Olaza is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 37, Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Celta Vigo's area.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Attention is being given to Alavesâ€™s Rodrigo Ely and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 40, Pablo Machin (Alaves) has taken off Rodrigo Ely who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Alberto Rodriguez is the replacement.
Celta Vigo push forward at Municipal de Balaidos and Nolito gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Alaves defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a Alaves throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 44, Alaves to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Celta Vigo needs to be cautious. Alaves have an attacking throw-in.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Fran Beltran (Celta Vigo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
At Municipal de Balaidos the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Antonio Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Alaves at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 47, Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Celta Vigo pushes forward through Brais Mendez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Antonio Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 49, Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
Alaves's Ruben Duarte gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
In the minute 51, Alaves have been awarded a corner by Antonio Alberola Rojas.
Alaves's Joselu is on target but unsuccessful.
In Vigo, Alaves push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Alaves.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
In the minute 55, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nestor Araujo (Celta Vigo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Alaves.
Lucas Olaza of Celta Vigo is pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Celta Vigo.
Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 61, Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Alaves.
Celta Vigo's Nolito has been booked in Vigo.
Alaves attack but Rodrigo Battaglia's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jota (Alaves) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 66, Antonio Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a Celta Vigo throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 68, Antonio Alberola Rojas awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Throw-in Alaves.
Miguel Baeza is replacing Nolito for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 70, Eduardo Coudet is making the team's second substitution at Municipal de Balaidos with Okay Yokuslu replacing Denis Suarez.
Celta Vigo drives forward and Iago Aspas gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Lucas Perez with John Guidetti. This is the second substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
Alaves make their third substitution with Tomas Tavares replacing Jota.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 75, Jose Fontan is on a sub for Fran Beltran for Celta Vigo.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Alaves in Vigo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Antonio Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 78, Antonio Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Celta Vigo's area.
Goal! Brais Mendez extends Celta Vigo's lead to 2-0.
Iago Aspas instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a fourth substitution, with Borja Sainz replacing Luis Rioja.
In the minute 85, The away team replace Rodrigo Battaglia with Manu Garcia.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Alaves.
Celta Vigo's Hugo Mallo has run offside.
In the minute 87, Alaves are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in Alaves.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 89, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Antonio Alberola Rojas will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Alaves are pushing forward but Tomas Pina's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
That's full-time at Municipal de Balaidos. The final score is 2-0.
Emre Mor is replacing Iago Aspas for the home team.
The home team replace Lucas Olaza with Joseph Aidoo.
